cast.name: 玛格丽特·鲁斯福德 Margaret Rutherford

this_title: Truly Miss Marple: The Curious Case of Margareth Rutherford
introduction: Margaret Rutherford's true life story is in fact much more eccentric than the most famous fictional role she ever played: Miss Jane Marple - Agatha Christie's amateur sleuth. Rutherford's version was the very first appearance of Miss Marple on the big screen and it was far removed though from the petite, upper middle-class lady in the detective novels.
chinese_title: Truly Miss Marple: The Curious Case of Margareth Rutherford
